solution_line_template: The total amount of money from washing cars is {num_cars_washed} * ${price_per_car} = ${<<{num_cars_washed}*{price_per_car}={money_from_cars}>>}{money_from_cars}
The total amount of money from mowing lawns {num_lawns_mowed} * ${price_per_lawn} = ${<<{num_lawns_mowed}*{price_per_lawn}={money_from_lawns}>>}{money_from_lawns}
The total amount of money Stormi makes is ${money_from_cars} + ${money_from_lawns} = ${<<{money_from_cars}+{money_from_lawns}={total_money_made}>>}{total_money_made}
